meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>fat</kanji> so the verb form of that is <vocabulary>to get fat</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You have to learn the ふと portion of this word to be able to read it. Here'a mnemonic to help you: 

It's easy <vocabulary>to get fat</vocabulary> if you're always in your <reading>futo</reading>n (ふと).
